main event: A civilian pilot observed a dark object with bright light being pursued by two F-94 aircraft over Long Island, NY, on October 29, 1952.
interesting points: The object maintained flight for 1 to 2 minutes before escaping at high speed., The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes., Other witnesses included USAF pilots and radar observers., The object was described as round and self-luminous with extraordinary maneuverability., There is speculation that the observation could be attributed to a balloon release from Mitchell AFB.
sighted object: a dark object with bright light
witness description: Civilian pilot and USAF personnel including pilots and radar observers
